Message:
the village was once again
devastated by a plague—

the same one that infected
me as a child.

With each passing day,
more and more people die...

But, what’s more concerning is
how much of an emotional strain
it all has been for Fortina.

She’s apparently been praying
at the Church ever since
the plague started spreading...

I just hope she’s eating
properly this time.

Feeling uneasy,
I go to the Church to check on her...
but what I found there was Fortina—

She looked pale with fear,
so I embraced her as
strongly as I could.
It’s going to be okay, Fortina...

I’m sorry for not noticing
what happened to you.

If this is one of “God’s trials”
that you usually talk about,
then I’ll face it alongside you.

I won’t let you suffer alone...
I vowed to always
protect you, after all.

Everything will be okay.
If the two us are together,
I’m sure we can get
through this.
